name: UPMCHealthPlan
0:
”Alexa, open u. p. m. c. health plan”
”Alexa, ask u. p. m. c. health plan what is UPMC Anywhere Care?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: u. p. m. c. health plan
Developer Terms of Use
des: UPMC Health Plan is committed to customer service and innovative technology. That's why our UPMC Health Plan skill has been created to help you get fast answers related to member benefits and coverage, and information and assistance regarding our services. The UPMC Health Plan skill can help commercial members: - Get answers about UPMC AnywhereCare's telehealth service - Learn about benefits and coverage like health coaching and preventive screenings - Understand basic health insurance terms. Our Alexa skill is always learning, so remember to check back often to hear what is new. Please note: If you are seeking medical advice, a diagnosis, have a question of a medical nature or are suffering a medical emergency, please contact your doctor or local emergency provider.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
